- amathi nimal siripalamerata siyaluma jalashawala wawwala ha gangawala jala mattama ha eewaye weliwala thaththwaya ha pirawi athi jala dharithawa dinapatha kolambaa sitama bala ganime kramayak langadima aarambha karana bawa warimarga ha jala kalamanakarana amathi nimal siripala da silwa mahatha pawasayi.merata warimarga kshethraye sanrakshana kriyadamayak lesa nawina pariganaka paddhathi upayogi karagena weli sanrakshana wyapruthiya mangin me katayuthu meheyawanu labe.weli sanrakshana wyapruthiya mangin merata athi pradhana jalashawala wiyapath weli 10 k purna prathisanskaranayata lak kirima aarambha kara athi bawath, thawath weli 7 k prathisanskaranaya kara sanrakshanaya kirimata konthrath giwisum assan kara athi bawath nimal siripala da silwa amathiwaraya pawasiya.me athara merata weliwala wishala jalashawala hadisi aluthwadiya katayuthu sandaha ‘jangama garaj’ lesa handinwimata haki siyalu nawina upakarana sahitha rupiyal laksha 1200 k watina wahana 5 k amathyanshaya yatathe athi aayathanawalata baradima da pasugiyada siduwiya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha

eda yuda samaye kotinta erehiwa wachanayak katha nokarapu ranil...widesha amathi lakshman kadhiragamar maruwe koti kiyanna konda pana nathi ranil...thrastha wadhayata wisadhuma lesa balaya bedima thora gath ranil..eekiya nayakan hiti eksath jathika pakshaya eksath, fedaral, balaya bedim mawathakata ragena giya ranil...yuddaya dina koti parada malwattiyaka thaba mahindagen gath eekiya rata nawatha eksath ( fedaral ) mathayata ragena yana ranil...me sinhala rate balaya beda sinhalayata yana enaman nathi karana ranil...rate sinhalayange awasanawa ranil....mita erehiwa adhirajya wirodhi, balaya bedimata wirodi , fedaral wirodi, eksath wirodi, eekiya sinhala baudda me thun sinhalaya raja kalen passe eka kodiyak sewanata gena aathri sinhaladishwara mahinda rajapaksha...
